document_data.name: ''Duskblade''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Duskblade''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[halberd]] once belonged to a deceased adventurer [[Patrick]] at the moment of his death in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The weapon was quote mundane in its appearance, with the metal of the halberd becoming tinted with umbral colors of the night.
document_data.Powers: The ''Duskblade'' absorbed the dark energies of the night and the deathly cold of darkness that made it a deadly weapon enchanted to freeze its targets upon successful attacks.
document_data.History: ''Duskblade'' once was an ordinary halberd that became an enchanted weapon after being left by a powerful [[lich]]'s soul ''[[phylactery]]'' for several hundreds of years. Some years before the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the lich was destroyed, likely by others of his kin. In 1369 DR, a [[ranger]] companion of [[Mazzy Fentan]] named Patrick wielded the ''Duskblade'' against the [[Shade Lord]] and his pet dragon [[Thaxll'ssillyia]], who infested an ancient ruined temple dedicated to [[Amaunator]] with darkness. Patrick perished in the struggle, and his undead form, now a [[shade]], wielded the ''Duskblade'' against anyone who dared to enter the temple.
